ingredients.content: 60 g honey, plus extra for drizzling

preparations.content: Place milk, cream, rose water, cardamom, vanilla seeds and honey in mixing bowl then, without measuring cup, heat <b>7 min/100°C/speed 1<b>.
Add rice and, without measuring cup, cook <b>30-35 min/90°C//speed 1<b>.

Add butter and mix well with spatula. Transfer to a serving bowl and allow to rest for 10 minutes. Serve warm or cold, garnished with toasted, flaked almonds, chopped pistachios, lime zest and drizzled with honey.
